```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Quick and ditry webscrape
```{r}
panic_lyrics <- read_html("http://www.songlyrics.com/panic!-at-the-disco/i-write-sins-not-tragedies-lyrics/") %>% 
  html_nodes("#songLyricsDiv") %>% 
  html_text()
```
